summary.bonus: 💰 Get €4.55 (or equivalent) by signing up with a referral code
summary.invito: Earn €1.00 when a friend installs a game + €5.00 when they make their first cashout

sections.title: How the referral program works
content: Share your referral link with friends
Earn €1.00 for each friend who signs up and installs a featured game
Your friend receives €4.55 as a welcome bonus
Get an extra €5.00 when your friend completes their first cashout
All rewards are paid as real, withdrawable cash

sections.title: Requirements to receive the bonuses
content: Only new, real users who sign up using your link
Friends must install and play a promoted game
Users must reside in an eligible country
Using duplicate or fraudulent accounts is prohibited

sections.title: Important notes
content: Rewards may vary depending on country
The program may change without prior notice
Contact support if referral rewards do not appear
